trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all chart element collections.
trans-unit.target: 代表所有圖表項目集合的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="False" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="False" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the item will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入之項目之以零起始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" /> for reference types.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an element into the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 將項目插入 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 中的指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Forces the invalidation of the parent chart element.
trans-unit.target: 強制讓父圖表項目失效。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的項目之以零起始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes the element at the specified index location of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 中位於指定之索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: Resumes the invalidation of a chart element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 繼續讓集合中的圖表項目失效。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A> method several times, you will need to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.ResumeUpdates%2A> method an equal number of times.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A>方法多次，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.ResumeUpdates%2A>方法有相同數目的時間。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要取代的項目之以零起始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定之索引位置的項目新值。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" /> for reference types.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 取代位於指定索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: Suspends the invalidation of a chart element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 暫停讓集合中的圖表項目失效。

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.Invalidate%2A> method will have no effect after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.Invalidate%2A>方法不會影響之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A> method several times, you will need to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.ResumeUpdates%2A> method an equal number of times.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A>方法多次，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.ResumeUpdates%2A>方法有相同數目的時間。
